event.title: stole a computer and other electronics Sunday morning

data.event: Rochester man says home was burglarized while he slept . A Rochester man was sleeping when burglars entered his home and stole a computer and other electronics Sunday morning, according to police.
The 26-year-old victim said he went to sleep about 4 a.m. Sunday and woke up about 9:30 a.m. to find the items missing.
